{
  "title": "Quinoa Buddha Bowl",
  "description": "A nutritious and colorful bowl packed with quinoa, fresh vegetables, and tahini dressing",
  "ingredients": [
    "1 cup quinoa",
    "2 cups mixed greens",
    "1 avocado, sliced",
    "1 cup cherry tomatoes, halved",
    "1/2 cup chickpeas",
    "2 tbsp tahini",
    "1 lemon, juiced",
    "2 tbsp olive oil",
    "Salt and pepper to taste"
  ],
  "instructions": [
    "Cook quinoa according to package instructions",
    "Prepare all vegetables and arrange in a bowl",
    "Mix tahini, lemon juice, and olive oil for dressing",
    "Combine all ingredients and drizzle with dressing",
    "Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately"
  ],
  "prepTime": 15,
  "cookTime": 20,
  "servings": 2,
  "difficulty": "easy",
  "cuisine": "Mediterranean",
  "dietaryTags": [
    "vegan",
    "gluten-free",
    "healthy"
  ]
}

{
  "title": "My Journey to a Plant-Based Lifestyle",
  "content": "After 6 months of transitioning to a plant-based diet, I wanted to share my experiences and the positive changes I've noticed in my health and energy levels. Here are some tips for anyone considering this journey...",
  "category": "lifestyle",
  "tags": [
    "plant-based",
    "health",
    "journey",
    "tips"
  ],
  "imageUrl": "https://example.com/plant-based-journey.jpg"
}

  "tags": [
    "plant-based",
    "health",
    "journey",
    "tips",
    "update"
  ]
}
